mapper.insert: insert into userInfo (user_code, user_password, user_name, user_birth, user_tel, user_email, user_team_code, user_hire_date) values (#{userCode}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userBirth}, #{userTel}, #{userEmail}, #{userTeamCode}, #{userHireDate})
mapper.select: select U.user_code as "userCode", U.user_name as "userName", U.user_birth as "userBirth", U.user_tel as "userTel", U.user_email as "userEmail", U.user_team_code as "userTeamCode", U.user_hire_date as "userHireDate", U.user_resign_date as "userResignDate", C.center_name as "centerName" from mapping M left outer join userInfo U on M.user_code = U.user_code left outer join center C on M.center_code = C.center_code order by U.user_code desc

select user_code as "userCode", user_name as "userName", user_birth as "userBirth", user_tel as "userTel", user_email as "userEmail", user_team_code as "userTeamCode", user_hire_date as "userHireDate", user_resign_date as "userResignDate" from userInfo where user_code=#{userCode}
